physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe scratching lesions at the upper back and deltoid regions.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After exclusion of diseases associated with itching and initiation of an elimination diet, the patient reported 80% reduction in pruritus after 10 days, with complete resolution one week later. Pruritus reappeared 3-4 days after resuming an unrestricted diet, and resolved again upon restoring the additive-free diet.
